EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.Name},
Interested in Web Development?
Transform UK have partnered up with The Challenge Society to offer a FREE, one-day intensive course in developing websites! The day will involve:
- Working alongside consultants from Transform UK to redesign The Challenge Society website;
- Learning about Customer User Experience (CUX) and how to maximise its potential;
- Developing key skills in website development and maintenance;
- An exciting Q&A with Transform UK's CEO!
Friday 22nd of July from 10:00 - 18:00 at Transform's office at 60 Great Portland Street, London, W1W 7RT.
There are only 15 spaces available and applications close on Sunday 10th of July.
CLICK HERE TO SIGN UP NOW!
BUILD YOUR CONFIDENCE WITH THE ARMY RESERVES

Saturday 9th of July from 09:30 - 16:30 in Grove Park!
